quest.name: Paths Barred
journal: Zero wishes to know your next destination.
objectives: Wait at the designated location outside Meghaduta.
Speak with Zero at Saltwind's Welcome.
Gather information near the Hamsa Hatchery.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Vrtra has quelled the tempest within his heart. He should be fine.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: That Azdaja's eye hasn't succumbed to Darkness bespeaks her incredible resilience.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: So let us trust in this sign that she yet lives, and be not deterred in our efforts.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHNBIG
dialogue.text: I must apologize for my bout of melancholy. To be so easily shaken ill becomes a great wyrm.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHNBIG
dialogue.text: You have remained at my side and ever offered me support and encouragement. I haven't the words to thank you.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Am I right in assuming that we are to return to the void?

dialogue.name: VARSHAHNBIG
dialogue.text: Now that matters here have been settled, yes. But first, we should return to Radz-at-Han to prepare. When everyone is ready, let us convene at Meghaduta.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: We know the fiend was headed north...

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: But that still leaves a lot of ground for us few to cover.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: We need a way to conduct our search more efficiently. Do you have any ideas?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I know people who may have seen something.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: We split up and make inquiries.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: In other words, we seek help from the locals? If you think it best, then very well.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: So. Where to, then?

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: In other words, we seek help from the locals? If you think it best, then very well.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: So. Where to, then?

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: The Great Work and the encampment at the Hamsa Hatchery? If both places are to the north, then the people there may indeed have seen something.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Very well, I will head to the Great Work, and leave the encampment to you.

dialogue.name: NAHBDEEN
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename. Is this about the happenings at the Bhaflau remnants?

dialogue.name: IMHUDI
dialogue.text: Saw the light over at the Bhaflau remnants too, did you? We've sent scouts to investigate, but they've yet to report back.

dialogue.name: IMHUDI
dialogue.text: We will continue to keep watch here, but if you learn anything, be sure to let us know.

dialogue.name: KHUTEEYU
dialogue.text: These fishermen saw a fiend emerge from the Bhaflau remnants before heading north, you say?

dialogue.name: KHUTEEYU
dialogue.text: I saw what I thought was a ball of flame flung from the explosion, but now I wonder...

dialogue.name: KHUTEEYU
dialogue.text: It flew north, in the direction of Khadga. If it is in fact a fiend, then we have trouble on our hands. We must remain vigilant.

dialogue.name: IMHUDI
dialogue.text: Ever since that explosion, we've seen nothing else unusual come from the waters, but there's no telling what our scouts may report.

dialogue.name: KHUTEEYU
dialogue.text: In case you're unfamiliar, Khadga is the massive rock formation that juts out over the water. That's where the ball of flame flew.

dialogue.name: NAHBDEEN
dialogue.text: I presume you've come to investigate the explosion at the Bhaflau remnants as well.

dialogue.name: NAHBDEEN
dialogue.text: We've yet to ascertain precisely what happened. Is there any information you can share with us?

dialogue.name: NAHBDEEN
dialogue.text: A fiend emerged from the explosion and flew towards Khadga!? By the Sisters! Had I learned of this soonerâ”€never mind. There is no time to waste!
